TopicTitle: Im not able to create a new campaign

Articles.Content: So basically power went off my PC while ksp2 was open and now loading takes 10x longer and i cant create a save to play on

Welcome to the forum @Rayquaza137, your issue has been moved from KSP 2 Discussion to Tech Support for better visibility. Have you tried verifying the game files?
https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB

25 minutes ago, James Kerman said:

Welcome to the forum @Rayquaza137, your issue has been moved from KSP 2 Discussion to Tech Support for better visibility. Have you tried verifying the game files?
https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB

Yes and i have also reinstalled the game, but nothing worked.

In your case, I would delete the config files that are stored in %USERPROFILE%\AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2

If that still doesn't work, then please provide your Player.log (in the same folder), and we will try to see if it can help us finding what happens

1 hour ago, Baleine said:

In your case, I would delete the config files that are stored in %USERPROFILE%\AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2

If that still doesn't work, then please provide your Player.log (in the same folder), and we will try to see if it can help us finding what happens

I'm not able to find the config files and i don't know how insert an image via files.

That's concerning…

You means the folder i mentioned doesn't exists? If that's the case, there is something very wrong.

You may try to launch the game as an administrator, that should alleviate any problems regarding rights.

By the way, you checked that there is free space on your disk?
